issues.info: You may report issues with the mod in the AvalancheIndex repository.

badge-profile.name: Badge On Profiles
badge-profile.description: Display member badges on the profile page.

badge-comments.name: Badge On Comments
badge-comments.description: Display member badges on comment cells.

solo-cells.name: Solo Level Cells
solo-cells.description: Highlight level cells for team members' solo levels.

solo-layers.name: Solo Level Pages
solo-layers.description: Customize level pages for team members' solo levels.

team-cells.name: Team Project Cells
team-cells.description: Highlight level cells for team projects.

team-layers.name: Team Project Pages
team-layers.description: Customize level pages for team projects.

err-notifs.name: Web Error Notifications
err-notifs.description: Display a notification when the badge web request fails.

web-once.name: Check Badges Once
web-once.description: Only send one web request to check a user's badge, instead of checking as much as the rate limit supports.

console.name: Log In Console
console.description: Log all mod actions in the console.
